Class PureJavaHidApi

java.lang.Object
purejavahidapi.PureJavaHidApi
public class PureJavaHidApi extends Object
PureJavaHidApi class is the entry point to access USB HID devices.

Static methods in PureJavaHidApi allow enumeration and opening of HID devices.

enumerateDevices() method returns a iist of HidDeviceInfo objects from which a device path can be obtained. The path can be passed to the openDevice(HidDeviceInfo path) method to obtain a HidDevice object which can then be used to communicate with the device.

See javadoc for above mentioned classes and methods for details.

  • Method Details

    • getVersion

      public static String getVersion()
      Returns:
      PureJavaHidApi library version string

    • enumerateDevices

      public static List<HidDeviceInfo> enumerateDevices()
      Returns a list of available USB HID devices.

      Passing a 0 for the vendorId or productId macthes everything and thus works as a wild card for matching. Passing 0 for both will return a list of all USB HID devices.

      Returns:
      List of HidDeviceInfo objects representing the matching devices.

    • openDevice

      public static HidDevice openDevice(HidDeviceInfo path) throws IOException
      Given a device path opens a USB device for communication.
      Parameters:
      path - A path obtained from a HidDeviceInfo object.
      Returns:
      An instance of HidDevice that can be used to communicate with the HID device.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the device cannot be opened
      See Also:
      • HidDeviceInfo.getPath()
